Author: mrdotboson#5783
Content: @gcharang is there plans to have a more UX friendly solution like MetaMask then for Komodo?

Author: mrdotboson#5783
Content: Also can you send me a link to this current solution

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@mrdotboson 
repo: <https://github.com/jl777/libnspv>
guide: <https://developers.komodoplatform.com/basic-docs/smart-chains/smart-chain-setup/nspv.html>
to access the browser version, launch the executable and  visit  http://127.0.0.1:<port>/ in the browser
replace port with the rpcport value in the coins file in the repo, for kmd, the value is `7771`
to launch a coin other than KMD, open the coin's file to verify it is present. then, `./nspv COINNAME`

a completely browser solution is possible and we are looking to port the nspv tech to wasm for inclusion in a webpage or extension

Author: cascrypto#8206
Content: looking for komodo fans to join us this friday near Den Hage we are discussing the futher of food and are planning on using komodo for carbon neutral farming! if you want to attend please let me or @barv know, we can help with tickets!!! also first track is very interesting with digital identity on the agenda

Author: ascii4rt#4513
Content: Hello

Author: cascrypto#8206
Content:
Together with the Ministry of LNV, NAJK, CTA, Ahold Delhaize, Danone, IBM, Google, Deloitte, Rabobank and another 10 of these partners, we take a look at how new technologies such as blockchain and A.I. strengthen farmers' income. We know that the bottleneck is not in technology itself, but more in issues such as the disadvantages of transparency and lack of long-term cooperation. How do we organize the food system in such a way that farmers can invest in the food of tomorrow?

During this event we will look with all players at the (im) possibilities of technology for:
- A unique farmers digital identity where the farmer has control over his/her own data
- New business models where, for example, employees, neighbors and consumers can participate in the company
- CO2 neutral business operations. How do we make a tradable CO2 certificate that financially rewards sustainable business?

During Strike Two you are actively introduced to technology. Together with the partners in these 3 tracks you will test the possibilities, accelerators and threats for farmers' income. As a concrete outcome of Strike Two, an innovation roadmap is made per track.

Content: we are planning on using kmd tech for the CO2 business case!!!!
